content: Young musicians inspired by Elton John include which British singer-songwriter who collaborated with him on the song 'Tiny Dancer' at the Grammy Awards?

I believe the British singer-songwriter you're referring to is George Ezra. He performed a collaborative version of "Tiny Dancer" with Elton John at the Grammy Awards in 2018. George Ezra is known for his soulful voice and songwriting skills, and his collaboration with Elton John was a memorable moment in their careers.
